name: My Reading Tutor
summary: A fun & effective way to help children conquer early reading with exercises, activities & interactive books! Exercises, activities & interactive books to practice: Phonics, Fluency, Vocabulary & Comprehension. Based on award winning My Virtual Tutor Series University Developed & Tested in 50 schools with 2500 students 14 Complete Story Books to read Teaches 8 Phonics and Reading Concepts Parent Mode tracks child’s progress Individualized Instruction
